name: Biggerband
description:
Biggerband is the answer to the evolution of the agencies towards a polymorphous creation. The structure of the agency is designed for maximum agility in order to create the optimal team around each project. Photographers, creators, designers, artists, journalists, consultants, trend-setters, engineers, the agency is at the center of these devices and remains the sole interlocutor of advertisers to ensure coherence and respect for constraints.
Bigger Band acts as a hub at the crossroads of arts and technology.
